edge_1: While searching for answers, Catwoman finds Slavicky's body and continues to investigate.
edge_2: Laurel contacts Catwoman and frames her for George's murder.

edge_1: While searching for answers, Catwoman finds Slavicky's body and continues to investigate.
edge_2: Catwoman is the supervillain alter ego of Patience Phillips, who falls to her death in this context after failing to grab hold of Patience's outstretched hand.

edge_1: Patience asks Laurel to keep an eye on George, but later Laurel murders George and frames Patience for the murder.
edge_2: Laurel admits to having Dr. Slavicky killed because he wanted to cancel the product's release.

edge_1: George reveals to Catwoman that he knows nothing about the side effects of Beau-line.
edge_2: Laurel contacts Catwoman and frames her for George's murder.
